channel.title: Privacy Policy Update 4/27: Webhooks
channel.description: **Webhooks** We may periodically create webhooks for/from in-game or for/from our other services, such as website or forum, that may announce activity. For example, when you start a match, a Discord message may popup stating you started a match with accompanying public info.

item.title: Privacy Policy Update 4/27: Webhooks
item.dc:creator: Ã­42-Xblade
item.description:
Webhooks
We may periodically create webhooks for/from in-game or for/from our other services, such as website or forum, that may announce activity. For example, when you start a match, a Discord message may popup stating you started a match with accompanying public info.

Read full topic
